dmca.title: Microsoft complains of infringing software on blogs
dmca.body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA256

VIA EMAIL:

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity

URL: http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/04/microsoft-autoroute-2006-con.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/07/my-rapidshare-folder-new-update_22.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/07/my-rapidshare-folder-new-update.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/07/this-is-my-rapidshare-folder.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/05/windows-xp-sp2-activator.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/05/microsoft-office-professional-2003-sp2.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/05/visual-basic-6-all-in-one.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/07/my-rapidshare-folder-new-update_22.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/07/my-rapidshare-folder-new-update.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/07/this-is-my-rapidshare-folder.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006/07/my-rapidshare-folder-updated.html
http://softfull.blogspot.com/2006_07_23_softfull_archive.html
CASE #: 47842

11 August 2006

Dear Sir or Madam,

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted works published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works:

Copyrighted work(s):
AutoRoute 2006
Office Professional Edition 2003
Visual Basic 6 Professional
Microsoft
